sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>tsunami</radical>s during the <radical>old</radical> <radical>moon</radical>s (many moons ago) were responsible for the world's <kanji>lake</kanji>s.
meaningInfo: Where did lakes come from? They are the residue of tsunamis from many moons ago.
readingMnemonic: "That's where <kanji>lake</kanji>s come from," you tell the <ja><reading>子</reading></ja> (<ja>こ</ja>).
readingInfo: This is just a stupid story to get this <ja>子</ja> to stop asking "why, why, why?" about everything. Earlier, the <ja>子</ja> asked "where do lakes come from?" and you had to come up with a crazy story to quiet them.
